description.value:
The {creature} has the following weapon enhancements:

Accuracy Scope. {creature} gains a +2 to attack rolls (included). Amplifying Barrel. Specialist gains a +2 to damage (included). Bayonet. {creature} can make melee attacks with the finesse property utilizing his sniper rifle.

Booming Strikes. Once per turn, when the {creature} hits with the weapon, he can deal an additional 1d6 damage (included). The weapon makes a loud boom which can be heard 100 feet away. If the {creature} is hidden, Intelligence (Investigation) and Wisdom (Perception) checks made to locate you that rely on sound have advantage.

Overcharge Weapon. The {creature} can expend one tech slot to deal additional damage to the target. The extra damage is 1d6 for a 1st-level tech slot, plus 1d6 for each slot level higher than 1st, to a maximum of 5d6. The damage is the same type as the weapon damage. You can add this damage to the extra damage of your Booming Strikes.
